metadata.name: DESIRE Devant
metadata.description:
The debut collection for CRYPTYQUES’ past phrase, "DESIRE" is a collection of 1,321 NFTs of reinvented classic Hong Kong movie scenes from the 1980s NEW WAVE. Each NFT reflects the strong emotional yearning of desire which have been recreated as 3D-animated video clips by Wing Shya and an internationally-acclaimed Hollywood production team.

DESIRE Devant is 1 of the 1, 321 of CRYPTYQUES’ DESIRE Collection, the one and only to be auctioned at Sotheby’s in July.
